physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a body of water in the foreground with numerous sailboats in operation. At the background, there are roofed buildings, trees, as well as a taller building with a tower. The reflection of the sailboats can be seen on the surface of the water.
title_text: Sailboats and buildings Photography Album (donation from Anthony Robert Saint Claire)
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Sailboats Bodies of water Buildings Marine photography
